title: Cognitive Empathy
description: Learn Cognitive Empathy in one minute.

buildup.text: Cognitive empathy is understanding another person's perspective and mental stateâ€”thinking about their thinking.

discovery.text: It's the most useful empathy type in leadership: anticipate reactions, tailor messages, and resolve conflict.

twist.text: Without emotional empathy alongside it, cognitive empathy can become cold calculationâ€”useful for manipulation too.

climax.text: The best leaders combine cognitive empathy with genuine care. They understand people and want to help them.

punchline.text: See through their eyes, think through their mind. That's the start.
